alert.note: Alert for Clay; Crawford; Jasper; Lawrence; Richland (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 9:03PM CST until February 04 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, as well as light additional sleet and ice accumulations possible. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph resulting in blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Jasper, Crawford, Lawrence, Richland and Clay Counties. * WHEN...Until midnight CST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the Internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com
